backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and member/cafe access with permission checks for users and admins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend components and styling files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining global OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables for the site.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling navigation between home, account, and access‑pass views.
frontend/src/components/account/AccountS: Account page showing membership status, Tonic access, and profile state with login and loading handling.
frontend/src/components/account/ProfileS: Modal dialog for first‑time users to enter and save their name as a profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button managing authentication state and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying branding, current year, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with logo, navigation buttons, login button, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Hero.t: Marketing hero section with logo, title, description, and a large facility image.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Holist: Displays three fitness principles with icons and descriptions in a grid layout.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Wrapper component providing consistent section padding and container layout.
frontend/src/components/marketing/TonicC: Showcases Tonic Cafe features and a members-only benefit using icons and styled cards.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Workou: Lists workout types with icons and descriptions in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/pass/TonicAccess: Renders a digital Tonic access pass based on authentication, user profile, and membership state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and helpers using Internet Identity, managing login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and updating caller user profiles and membership state through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes, and global typography and layout styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global CSS and rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, and clear URL and session parameters, with support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions including OKLCH color tokens, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Holds metadata about project state, features, requirements, and planned assets for the Gym & Tonic app.
